document.full_text: keith olbermann had put a photo on twitter of brett weber, a yankees baseball operations coaching assistant, holding up four fingers toward the field during thursday's game against the detroit tigers.
document.title: yankees to stop hand signals after mlb inquiry
lines_and_colors: keith olbermann had put a photo on twitter of brett weber, a yankees baseball operations coaching assistant, holding up four fingers toward the field during thursday's game against the detroit tigers.
